about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a freelance cinematographer and video editor.
about.description:
I am a freelance cinematographer and video editor, passionate about creating powerful visual stories that connect with audiences. From concept development and shooting supervision to editing, color grading, motion graphics, and finishing, I specialize in transforming raw footage into compelling narratives. I‚Äôve worked on diverse projects, blending artistic storytelling with technical precision, and I believe every frame has the power to leave a lasting impact.

Alongside my creative work, I am also pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science at G.H. Raisoni College of Engineering (GHRCE), with a growing interest in cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and system administration. Currently, I‚Äôm gaining hands-on experience in content creation and video production through my part-time role at Entrance Zone (Vatsala Academic).

While my primary passion lies in filmmaking and editing, my background in technology and cybersecurity gives me a unique perspective ‚Äî enabling me to approach projects with creativity, precision, and problem-solving skills.
